actions: Promotes movement of Qi, alleviates pain, descends Qi, regulates the Middle, dispels Cold, warms the Kidneys, Spleen and Stomach, stops vomiting and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
Dries Dampness, warms the Middle Jiao, stops vomiting and strengthens the Spleen.

symptoms: Frequent epigastric and abdominal distention and fullness which is worse after eating
Vomiting of partially digested food about twelve hours after eating
The vomitus may have thick or thin frothy mucus
Maybe epigastric masses and/or splash on palpation
Mild constant epigastric pain; relieved by warmth and pressure
Maybe clear, watery, copious vaginal discharge

notes: Grind the above ingredients into a fine powder and take 1.5g three times daily.
